Body:
I'm planning to write a Linguistic Capital narrative on my friends as part of a small-scale project. What questions should I ask them to really get into the details of their linguistic capital?

Basic questions, such as; 'what language can you speak?' go without saying.

I want to add a depth to my writing but having never completed a linguistic narrative before, I thought I'd search for some advice first.
Title: What questions should I ask to research a linguistic narrative?
